question.title: Unable to install IvyDE in Eclipse
question.body:
I'm working on a Java project in Eclipse IDE 4.32.0.20240606-0749. I'm trying to install IvyDE but I'm encountering some issues.

Here's what I've done so far:

I tried to add IvyDE Managed Dependencies through the Java Build Path in my project properties, but the option was not available.

I checked if IvyDE was installed through the Eclipse Marketplace, but it wasn't.

I tried to install IvyDE through the Eclipse Marketplace, but I encountered an error saying "No repository found at https://www.apache.org/dist/ant/ivyde/updatesite."

I tried to add the IvyDE update site manually using the URL http://ant.apache.org/ivy/ivyde/update, but I encountered an error saying "Could not find http://ant.apache.org/ivy/ivyde/update."

I'm not sure what to do next. Any help would be greatly appreciated.
